remarks: First-quadrant Pell solutions are bounded away from 1.  (This particular bound allows us to prove exact values for the fundamental solution later.)  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Sep-2014.)
statement: pell1qrgap $p |- ( ( D e. ( NN \ []NN ) /\ A e. ( Pell1QR ` D ) /\ 1 < A ) -> ( ( sqrt ` ( D + 1 ) ) + ( sqrt ` D ) ) <_ A ) $.
